sServerTab0: This server was created as a platform to develop an open source configuration tool for DayZ servers.
Building a working economy and configuring mods takes time and effort, but with this tool,
anyone should be able to stand up and modify a DayZ server with ease.
All the configuration and utilities to generate it are available at https://github.com/schana/dayz-server-carim
sServerTab1: Rules will be developed as the community grows
sServerTab2: Support is available in the #tickets channel on Discord
